thread.title: BRIEF-Shaw Q2 Revenue Rose 12.4 Pct To C$1.36 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shaw Q2 Revenue Rose 12.4 Pct To C$1.36 Bln
text:
April 12 (Reuters) - Shaw Communications Inc:
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.33 * Q2 RESTRUCTURING CHARGE OF $417 MILLION RELATED TO TOTAL BUSINESS TRANSFORMATION INITIATIVE
* QTRLY ARPU OF $38.43 VERSUS $36.44 IN Q2 2017 * ANTICIPATED ANNUALIZED SAVINGS RELATED TO VDP, EXPECTED TO BE ABOUT $215 MILLION AND WILL BE FULLY REALIZED IN FISCAL 2020
* VDP RELATED COST REDUCTIONS IN FISCAL 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $48 MILLION
* YEAR TBT RESTRUCTURING COSTS TO EXCEED $450 MILLION * ABOUT 1,200 EMPLOYEES WILL BE EXITING BEFORE THE END OF FISCAL 2018 AS PART OF VDP
* MONTH PERIOD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
